name: A Nightmare at the House of the Damned
author: Toto00

firstNightReminder: Ask the Genius to choose a good character.
otherNightReminder: Ask the Genius to choose a good character.
name: Genius
ability: Each night, choose a good character: you have that ability until you choose again. You are drunk every other night.

name: Apothecary
ability: Once per game, publicly change one game rule, if the Storyteller agrees.

firstNightReminder: Show the *YOU ARE* token and the character token of a not in play Minion.
name: Mole
ability: You are a minion too. You register as evil. If the demon publicly guesses you (once), your team loses, even if you have no ability.

name: Vat Dweller
ability: On your 1st night, choose an Outsider. Every Outsider is a copy of that Outsider. [Any number of Outsiders]
firstNightReminder: Ask the Vat Dweller to choose an outsider.

name: Wizard
ability: Once per game, choose to make a wish. If granted, your wish may have a price & leaves a clue as to its nature.

name: Imposter
ability: You poison and gain the ability of the 1st in-play character that you are mad about being each day.

otherNightReminder: Choose a player, that player dies.
name: Zeitghast
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You act last every night. [+1 Minion]

firstNightReminder: Wake a good player and show them the jnak and one other player.
otherNightReminder: Choose a player, that player dies
name: J'Nak
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. 1 good player knows you are 1 of 2 players. If executed while a minion lives, your team wins.
